was a Greek city founded by the Corintian-Syracusan in 598.BC. The Archeological Park of Kamarina is at 25km from

Kamarina was destroied several times. First by the Punic-Cartaginian (403.BC), then by the Romans (258.BC) and at last by the Arabs in 827.
From Ragusa, Marina di Ragusa or Scoglitti.
Tepmle of Athena, the ruins of the city and the fortification walls.
Inside the Archeological Park is the Archeological Museum of Kamarina where there is a small gift-shop where you can buy souvenirs and postcards.
